title: The Double Doink Game | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 378)
description:
Reactions from wild-card weekend, including the Bears' tragic loss to the Eagles and the Chargers' impressive defensive showing against Baltimore (0:30), the Seahawks' refusal to abandon the run, and the Colts' exciting future (32:30).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark
